lingmod:JianKeCard.NAME: Jian Ke
CONTENT: 十年磨一剑，霜刃未曾试
TONE_PATTERN: 仄平平仄仄，平仄仄平仄
lingmod:JianKeCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! BLock NL complete lingmod:Last_line ：deal damage equal to twice your Block, total  !D! Damage，lose all Block

lingmod:PoZhenZiCard.NAME: Po Zhen Zi
lingmod:PoZhenZiCard.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage NL （damage based of poetry progression left）

lingmod:ChiBiFuCard.NAME: Chi Bi Fu
CONTENT: 盈虚者如彼，而卒莫消长也
TONE_PATTERN: 平平仄平平，平仄平仄仄
lingmod:ChiBiFuCard.DESCRIPTION: Apply all your debuffs to enemy，only !M! stacks

lingmod:FeiHuaLingCard.NAME: Fei Hua Ling
lingmod:FeiHuaLingCard.DESCRIPTION: Passive: Playing a card with a different type than the last card played deals damage equal to ${ModID}:poetry_inspiration statcks, Lose half of ${ModID}:poetry_inspiration

lingmod:ManJiangHongCard.NAME: Man Jiang Hong
CONTENT: 怒发冲冠，凭栏处，潇潇雨歇
抬望眼，仰天长啸，壮怀激烈
莫等闲，白了少年头，空悲切
TONE_PATTERN: 仄仄平平，平平仄，平平仄仄
平仄仄，仄平平仄，仄平仄仄
仄仄平，仄仄仄平平，平平仄
